class_notes: We will examine how health research is covered in news articles. We will practice various skills to critically read health news and learn separating real news from exaggerated news. The aim of the course is to encourage curiosity, to increase scientific perceptiveness, to raise communication awareness, and to build critical evaluation skills.
course_description: We will examine how health research is covered in the news and learn to distinguish accurate reports from exaggerations. The course aims to encourage curiosity, to increase scientific perceptiveness, to raise communication awareness, and to build critical evaluation skills.
